name: Space Rock Cleanup
description:
Story:

You are a space ship and you shoot rocks. Those pesky rocks get everywhere and your laser weapon can only shoot so many times before it overheats.

Good luck out there.

Controls: Game play:
  • 'A' - Rotate ship left
  • 'D' - Rotate ship right
  • 'W' - Accelerate ship forward
  • 'S' - Brakes ship, moves backwards
  • Space - Shoots straight ahead
Respawn:
  • Move ship around with mouse pointer
  • Press left mouse button to place ship and respawn.
